portfolio.about.me.desc.short: Writes code. Breaks code. Fixes code.
portfolio.about.me.desc.top: I'm a software developer who loves building fast, smart, and slightly over-engineered things. Obsessed with low-level logic, clean architecture, and any excuse to optimize performance.
portfolio.about.me.desc.bottom: I'm constantly learning, improving, and pushing myself to build software that's reliable, scalable, and genuinely useful. Let's turn ideas into well-crafted solutions.
